mapper.insert: INSERT INTO api_assertion (id, task_id, assertion_type, expected_value, actual_value, passed, error_message, sort_order) VALUES (#{id}, #{taskId}, #{assertionType}, #{expectedValue}, #{actualValue}, #{passed}, #{errorMessage}, #{sortOrder})
mapper.update: UPDATE api_assertion SET assertion_type = #{assertionType}, expected_value = #{expectedValue}, actual_value = #{actualValue}, passed = #{passed}, error_message = #{errorMessage}, sort_order = #{sortOrder} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM api_assertion WHERE task_id = #{taskId} ORDER BY sort_order ASC
SELECT * FROM api_assertion WHERE response_id = #{responseId} ORDER BY sort_order ASC
